rule:

input: Computers process data. Software runs applications. Users interact daily.
complianceText:
The output consists of multiple

tags with each sentence wrapped in a

tag. Each

tag contains one tag and multiple tags, fulfilling part of the description. However, the description specifies "at least three

tags, the use of six does not violate the description. Each

tag includes a tag and at least one tag, as required, indicating compliance with the description. No violation. OK
